longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for the period of intended stay. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of emergency and temporary passports.

Visa required, except for Nationals of Armenia. 
Minors:
- Passengers under 18 years of age 
Additional Information:
- Normal non-biometric passports issued to nationals of
  Armenia must contain an endorsement stating the validity of
  the passport for stays abroad.
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward ticket could be refused
  entry
